name: Pusu: Uyanış
storyline:
Fatih Yıldırım is a first lieutenant at NATO Belgium headquarters. Fatih's father, Refik Yıldırım, is a scientist who conducts scientific research on mental issues in Turkey.
During his research on the use of mind, Refik unwittingly entered into a partnership with Fuat Erkaya, a businessman with a dark past. Fatih, on the other hand, is not aware of the events that are developing.

Fatih takes a shower in his room after a tiring day. At the same time, Aylin calls Fatih from her house in Istanbul. Since Fatih is in the shower, he does not hear the phone ring. The answering machine is activated. Aylin responds with a worried and a little scared voice:

"I'm Fatih, Aylin. You need to come to Istanbul right away. Strange things are happening here. I haven't been able to reach your father for days. Strange things happen at work, too. When you come to Istanbul, we'll talk about the details. Take care."

Fatih listens to the message when he gets out of the shower. He decides to go to Istanbul to investigate what happened. In the face of future events, Fatih's life may change radically.
summary: Pusu:Uyanış is the first 3D action game of its kind in Turkey.
